snippet: In “Shine Shine Shine,” Lydia Netzer’s first novel, a bald mother and her astronaut husband seek a formula for life.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book Shine Shine Shine by Lydia Netzer.
lead_paragraph: In “Shine Shine Shine,” Lydia Netzer’s first novel, a bald mother and her astronaut husband seek a formula for life.

headline.seo: ‘Shine Shine Shine,’ a Novel by Lydia Netzer
headline.main: Sending Chick Lit Over the Moon With a Metaphysical Spin
headline.print_headline: Sending Chick Lit Over the Moon With a Metaphysical Spin
